QuestData.Title: Unwanted Pests
QuestData.Description: Those creatures out in the shallows keep busting the turrets as fast as we can get them operational.$b$bI'm supposed to go clear them out but my blaster is completely busted; the damn thing barely can light a candle like this!$b$bCould you do me a favor and go kill a few of those pests while I get my blaster fixed at the shop?$b$bJust let Gazwitz know you covered for me so I can get reimbursed for the repair.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 10 Spore Drifters or Fungal Hulks in Sporemist Shallows.
QuestData.RewardText: Lemmy's gun broke down again I take it?$b$bGood job covering for 'em out there. I could use more workers like you!
